title: Full Stack Developer
details: Developed robust web applications using JavaScript (Node.js, Express.js, and ReactJS) for enhanced user experiences. Collaborated with the team to create interactive web apps with VueJS. Ensured software quality and stability through bug fixes and rigorous QA testing. Introduced new features to enhance user functionality and resolve customer-reported issues, improving overall satisfaction.

title: Full Stack Developer
details: Built web applications using JavaScript, PHP, NodeJS, TypeScript, EJS, and OAuth. Collaborated with web designers and backend teams to optimize application visuals, features, speed, and stability. Played a pivotal role in coding, issue identification, and solution implementation. Produced clear and functional documentation for frontend development.

details: Contributed to software development using Python and XML in an Odoo developer role. Gained experience in C# during the internship at Screen-In Lda. Studied technical management and systems programming, covering C, Java, and MySQL.
